titles.title: Thou O Lord art a shield about me

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Thou O Lord art a shield about me
You're my glory
You're the lifter of my head
Thou O Lord art a shield about me
You're my glory
You're the lifter of my head

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hallelujah
Hallelujah
Hallelujah
You're the lifter of my head

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Senor eres un escudo a mi alrededor
eres la Gloria y quien levanta mi cabeza
Aleluya, aleluya, aleluya
eres quien levanta mi cabeza
